At that time, after NÄá¹­a-deva had spoken this mantra,
he further addressed the Buddha, saying:
World-Honored One, this mind-mantra of mine,
if there are practitioners who recite it according to the Dharma until they have mastered it,
they will be able to accomplish a thousand kinds of matters.
If there are practitioners who wish to stop thunder and hail,
they should use a sword, or a pomegranate branch,
or a karavÄ«ra branch, or water or ash,
and so on, with these things,
empower them by reciting this mantra once,
and then use them to stop the thunder and hail.
Furthermore, if there are practitioners
who are possessed by those evil yaká¹£as and rÄká¹£asas,
if they wish to expel them, they should use agalloch incense,
empower it by reciting this mantra once,
and then burn it to fumigate the possessor.
Having smelled this fragrance, they will then speak of matters and be able to stop.
Moreover, if a practitioner
wishes to summon all devas, nÄgas, yaká¹£as, gandharvas, asuras, garuá¸as, kiá¹ƒnaras, mahoragas,
and rÄká¹£asas, bhÅ«tas, piÅ›Äcas, etc.,
they should use agalloch incense.
Recite this mantra and empower it once.
Burn it and the summoned will arrive.
If you wish to dismiss them,
also use agalloch incense and recite this mantra.
Empower it once as before and burn it.
The dismissed will leave.
Moreover, if you wish to make the bowl speak of matters and move,
fill the bowl with burnt clay ash.
Place it in the maá¹‡á¸ala and recite this mantra.
Empower agalloch incense and burn it.
Again recite this mantra once.
The bowl will speak like a person.
It will speak of matters for the practitioner and be able to move.
If one wishes to make the argha vase speak and move,
one should select a pure white argha vase, clean and new,
and use white sandalwood, guggulu incense, and so forth,
to make an unguent and apply it.
Fill it with pure water and insert beautiful flowers.
Recite the heart mantra and empower it once.
Place it in the maá¹‡á¸ala and burn agaru incense.
Recite the heart mantra once.
The vase will speak as before.
Again, recite the heart mantra and empower white mustard seeds to strike the vase.
The vase will then rise eight fingers off the ground.
As one wishes, it will return to the maá¹‡á¸ala.
If one wishes to make the caitya move,
first use white sandalwood, guggulu incense, and so forth,
to make an unguent and apply it.
Then burn agaru incense,
snap one's fingers, and recite the heart mantra to empower it.
The caitya will naturally move and return to its original place.
If one wishes to make animals speak,
one should burn agalloch incense and fumigate the ashes and white mustard seeds.
Recite the heart mantra and empower them twenty-one times.
Then recite the heart mantra again.
Throw the ashes and mustard seeds onto the animal's body and it will immediately speak.
If one wishes to make a young girl speak,
one should use cow dung that has not fallen on the ground.
Smear it to make a square maá¹‡á¸ala.
Then select a young girl with a beautiful appearance and complete limbs.
Bathe her, make her pure, and have her wear new white clothes.
Have her sit in the center of the maá¹‡á¸ala.
Make offerings of various flowers and burn agalloch incense.
She will then be able to speak of past, present, and future events.
If one wishes to make a young boy speak,
one should use white mustard seeds and mix them with ghee ash.
Recite the heart mantra once and empower them.
Smoke them with agalloch incense and throw them on the boy's head.
He will then speak.
Moreover, if one wishes to control fire so that it is not hot,
one should use firewood and recite the heart mantra.
Empower it once.
Smoke the anxuli incense and burn it in the fire.
The fire will then become cold like snow.
Moreover, if one wishes to control all evil spells,
one should use pure white thread.
Recite the heart mantra and empower it once.
Smoke the anxuli incense and burn it.
Tie it to the left arm of the practitioner.
All evil spells will be subdued.
Moreover, if one wishes to make a manmatha perform the siddhi method,ğŸ”½one should smear a maá¹‡á¸ala with cow dung that has not fallen on the ground.
Place the manmatha in the center of the maá¹‡á¸ala.
Make offerings with various flowers and smoke the anxuli incense.
Recite the heart mantra and empower it once.
This manmatha can perform the siddhi rites.
Moreover, it can be made to move at will.
This manmatha, if brought into a battle formation, will naturally win.
Even trees, forests, mountains, and rocks can be destroyed.
Whatever tasks are undertaken by practitioners will all be accomplished.
Furthermore, if one wishes to perform the accomplishment method for a bow,
one should use guggul resin and recite the heart mantra once to empower it.
Burn it with incense.
One will then be able to accomplish things according to one's wishes.
Furthermore, if one wishes to perform the accomplishment method for a trident,
make the maá¹‡á¸ala as before.
Then recite the heart mantra once.
Empower the trident with guggul resin incense and burn it with incense.
Place it in the maá¹‡á¸ala and recite the heart mantra once again.
At that time, the trident will emit a blazing light.
It will move and rise off the ground in the four directions.
Then it will return and enter the maá¹‡á¸ala.
Perform the accomplishment method according to the practitioner's wishes.
Furthermore, if one wishes to perform the accomplishment method for a sword,
use guggul resin and recite the heart mantra.
Empower it once and burn it with incense.
It can also accomplish all things.
Furthermore, if one wishes to make Ká¹£etrapÄla accomplish the method,ğŸ”½One should use ghee ash and recite the heart mantra.
Empower it once and apply it to Ká¹£etrapÄla.
One will then be able to accomplish all things.
Furthermore, if one wishes to make Garuá¸a accomplish the method,
First, one should apply the method to paint a maá¹‡á¸ala.
Then, one should select a pure Garuá¸a according to the method.
Anoint it with white sandalwood incense.
Place it in the maá¹‡á¸ala.
Burn agalloch incense and empower it once by reciting the heart mantra.
Then, what is accomplished will be able to move.
It will also be able to speak of the events of the three times.
Furthermore, one should use a sharp sword and recite the heart mantra.
Empower it once and fumigate it with agalloch incense.
Then, the practitioner should recite the syllable hÅ«á¹ƒ loudly and empower the sword.
The sword will then emit light and rise up into the sky.
It will then return to its original place.
If one enters a battle, the enemy will retreat and be defeated.
Moreover, if one wishes to cause the images in a heavenly shrine to move,
in front of those images, burn agalloch incense.
Recite the heart mantra once.
Then those heavenly images will move according to one's wishes.
Moreover, if in a certain place,
the practitioner suspects there is a hidden treasure and wishes to take it,
then at that place, make a maá¹‡á¸ala.
Burn agalloch incense and recite the heart mantra once.
The hidden treasure will appear.
Moreover, using white mustard seeds, recite the heart mantra and empower them once.
Scatter these mustard seeds everywhere.
Either in a village or an empty house,
in front of a heavenly shrine image or at a stÅ«pa site,
up to mountain cliffs, dragon ponds, and other such places,
wherever they are scattered, burn agalloch incense and recite the heart mantra once.
The hidden treasures there will all appear.
Moreover, using white mustard seeds, recite the heart mantra and empower them once.
Take this mustard seed and throw it at the elephant's body.
And burn asafetida incense to fumigate it.
Recite the heart mantra once again.
That elephant will be able to do things well according to the practitioner's intentions.
Or it can be used to destroy an archenemy, also according to one's wishes.
Furthermore, if one wishes to cure malaria and protect others,
Use ash, white mustard seed, and water mixed together.
Recite the heart mantra once and empower it.
Burn asafetida incense to fumigate it and wear it on one's body.
Malaria will be cured and protection will be obtained.
Furthermore, if one wishes to stop all fears,
Use white thread and burn asafetida incense to fumigate it.
Recite the heart mantra once and empower it.
Wear it around one's neck and all fears will be removed.
Furthermore, if one wishes to cure all illnesses,
Use asafetida and recite the heart mantra once to empower it.
Burn it to fumigate the patient's body and all illnesses will be cured.
Furthermore, if one wishes to cause an archenemy to fall into a pit,
One should use white sandalwood and recite the heart mantra once to empower it.
One can then cause all the sÄdhya to enter the homa fire.
Moreover, if one wishes to cause the sÄdhya to enter the homa fire and be reborn,
one should mix gum guggul and white sandalwood.
Recite the heart mantra once to empower it.
Recite the sÄdhya's name and perform homa seven times, and they will enter the homa fire.
If one wishes to stop,
one should also use white sandalwood and recite the heart mantra once to empower it.
Perform homa seven times and it will stop.
Moreover, if one wishes to cause the sÄdhya
to obtain the vajra-grasp,
one should use white sandalwood.
Take the sÄdhya's name and recite it together with the heart mantra.
Empower it seven times.
Throw it into the fire.
One will obtain the vajra-grasp.
If one wishes to stop,
Use ash, empower it once,
and place it on the crown of the head. The pain will then cease.
Furthermore, if one wishes to cure all malaria,
use a black thread, recite the heart mantra, empower it once,
and tie it around the arm. The illness will be cured.
Furthermore, if one wishes to cure all illnesses,
use seven kinds of grains and white mustard seeds mixed together,
smear them with ghee, recite the heart mantra, and perform homa. The illness will be cured.
Furthermore, if one wishes to cure someone who has been poisoned,
use a peacock feather, recite the heart mantra,
empower it, and brush the person's body with it. The poison will be removed.
For the above methods, all use guggul incense.
Recite the heart mantra and empower it. All will be accomplished.
